attributes.action: condemn homophobic hate crime in Suffolk and the rest of England, to support the Suffolk Constabulary and police forces across the country in being able to deal with crimes of this nature quickly and effectively and to positive conclusions, whereby victims can live without fear of future recrimination
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We state a lack of confidence in the Suffolk Constabulary in being able to respond quickly and effectively to a particular homophobic hate crime within Suffolk, and that this illustrates a failure of a duty of care and in maintaining policies responsible for the protection of communities and individuals. We believe there is an insult to human dignity where the incitement to violence and vandalism towards LGBT community members is seen as a lesser crime to that of incitement to any other minority group within our society.
